statements: SELECT * FROM FoodSupplyChain;
SELECT id, product_name, origin FROM FoodSupplyChain;
SELECT product_name, production_practices FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE transportation = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE origin = 'USA' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, origin, production_practices FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE origin = 'Europe' AND production_practices IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE origin = 'Mexico' ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, product_name FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE production_practices = 'Organic' ORDER BY id;
SELECT product_name, origin, transportation FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE product_name LIKE '%Apple%' AND production_practices = 'Conventional' ORDER BY origin, product_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, origin FROM FoodSupplyChain GROUP BY origin HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodSupplyChain WHERE origin LIKE '%USA%' OR transportation IS NULL ORDER BY origin, transportation DESC;
SELECT * FROM origin WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, region FROM origin WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT description FROM production_practices WHERE method = 'Organic';
SELECT * FROM origin ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT city, region, country FROM origin WHERE region IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM origin WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT city, region FROM origin WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM production_practices WHERE method = 'Organic' AND certification = 'USDA';
SELECT id, description FROM production_practices WHERE certification IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM origin WHERE country = 'Italy' ORDER BY region ASC, city DESC;
SELECT * FROM origin_info WHERE origin_id = 1
SELECT location, origin_date FROM origin_info ORDER BY origin_date DESC
SELECT practice_name, description FROM production_practices WHERE practice_id = 3
SELECT * FROM transportation_info ORDER BY transport_mode
SELECT transport_id, transport_mode FROM transportation_info WHERE distance_km > 100
SELECT * FROM origin_info ORDER BY location DESC, origin_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT origin_id, location FROM origin_info WHERE origin_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT practice_id, practice_name, description FROM production_practices WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT transport_mode, distance_km FROM transportation_info WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transport_mode ASC;

SELECT origin_id, location, origin_date FROM origin_info JOIN transportation_info ON origin_info.origin_id = transportation_info.transport_id WHERE origin_date < '2022-01-01' AND transport_mode = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM origin_info ORDER BY origin_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_info WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT practice_name FROM production_practices WHERE description LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT transport_mode, route_details FROM transportation_info WHERE transport_id <= 5;
SELECT origin_name, address, contact_person FROM origin_info WHERE origin_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM origin_info;
SELECT origin_name, address FROM origin_info ORDER BY origin_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, weight FROM product_info WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT product_name, practice_name, description FROM product_info JOIN production_practices ON product_info.practice_id = production_practices.practice_id;
SELECT transport_mode, route_details FROM transportation_info WHERE transport_mode = 'Air';
SELECT * FROM origin;
SELECT country, producer_name FROM origin WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT product_name, practice_name FROM food_products JOIN production_practices ON food_products.practice_id = production_practices.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE start_location != end_location;

SELECT product_name, country, transport_type FROM food_products JOIN origin ON food_products.origin_id = origin.origin_id JOIN transportation ON food_products.transport_id = transportation.transport_id;
SELECT * FROM origin;
SELECT country, producer_name FROM origin WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT product_name, transport_type FROM food_products JOIN transportation ON food_products.transport_id = transportation.transport_id;
SELECT product_name, description FROM food_products JOIN production_practices ON food_products.practice_id = production_practices.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM origin WHERE country = 'USA' AND producer_name = 'Organic Farms Inc.';
